events.body:
♻️ Automatically closing for now based on heuristics. Please leave a comment, if this was erroneous.
Generally, please focus on creating high-quality, original content that demonstrates a clear
understanding of the project's requirements and goals.

📝 Moderators: If this is spam, please replace the title with `.`, so that the thread does not appear in
search results.

LLM spam detection (✨ experimental): SPAM. The submission contains no substantive description, rationale, or code—only boilerplate/template text and a vague promotional-sounding title—so it appears to be a placeholder or irrelevant promotional submission rather than a legitimate issue or PR.

♻️ Automatically wiping, closing, and locking for now based on heuristics.
Generally, please focus on creating high-quality, original content that demonstrates a clear
understanding of the project's requirements and goals.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--006a51241073e994b41acfe9ec718e94-->
### Code Coverage & Benchmarks
For details see: https://corecheck.dev/bitcoin/bitcoin/pulls/33907.
<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->
### Reviews
See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process.
A summary of reviews will appear here.
<!--5faf32d7da4f0f540f40219e4f7537a3-->
### LLM Linter (✨ experimental)

Possible typos and grammar issues:

- ``` (end fence shown as ````) -> ``` [The code block in the README was closed with four backticks (````), which breaks standard Markdown code fencing; use three backticks to properly close the ```text block.]
